item.title: エラン・クロス・スティーブンス氏がBBCの会長代行に就任、6月27日から12ヶ月間、または正会員が見つかるまで、どちらか早いほうの期間となる（The Guardian）。
item.description:
The Guardian:
Elan Closs Stephens is appointed acting chair of the BBC and will start from June 27 for 12 months or until a permanent chair is found, whichever is sooner  —  BBC board member to assume role from 27 June after resignation of Richard Sharp  —  Prof Dame Elan Closs Stephens …

item.title: Netflixの株主は、WGAが報酬案の拒否を求めた後、拘束力のない投票で同社の役員報酬案に対する支持を留保した（Dawn Chmielewski/Reuters)
item.description:
Dawn Chmielewski / Reuters:
Netflix shareholders withheld support for the company's executive pay package in a non-binding vote, after a call by the WGA to reject the proposed compensation  —  Netflix Inc (NFLX.O) shareholders on Thursday withheld their support for the company's executive pay package …

item.title: 情報源: SpotifyのParcast、Gimlet、その他のポッドキャストスタジオの幹部はまだ今年の予算を受け取っておらず、新番組や一部の経費の妨げになっている（Ashley Carman/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Sources: executives at Spotify's Parcast, Gimlet, and other podcast studios still have not received budgets for the year, hindering new shows and some expenses  —  Hi, welcome back to Soundbite.  This week was a short one, so we're going to run through a couple stories and get out of here.

item.title: オーディオパブリッシャーズアソシエーション：2022年の米国オーディオブック売上は前年比10%増の$1.8B、出版社はデジタルオーディオが2022年米国書籍出版売上の10.4%を占めると発表（Porter Anderson/Publishing Perspectives)
item.description:
Porter Anderson / Publishing Perspectives:
Audio Publishers Association: US audiobook revenue grew 10% YoY to $1.8B in 2022; publishers say digital audio made up 10.4% of 2022 US book publishing revenue  —  The Audio Publishers Association finds in its annual report that audiobook sales generated US$1.8 billion in the United States in 2022.

item.title: インサイダーユニオンによると、インサイダー経営陣との公正な契約に合意できず、250人の従業員が無期限ストライキに突入したとのこと（@insiderunion）。
item.description:
@insiderunion:
Insider Union says it has failed to agree on a fair contract with Insider management and 250 employees are now on indefinite strike  —  It's official: THE INSIDER UNION IS ON STRIKE. Management failed to agree on a fair contract that settles our healthcare ULP and pays us what we're worth. Starting now, over 250 Insider employees are on indefinite strike. You want us back @thisisinsider? Settle the contract. ✊ [image]

item.title: Meta、カナダでInstagramとFacebookのニュースをブロックするテストを実施、カナダで法案C-18が可決された場合、Googleに続きニュース媒体を完全にブロックする可能性を計画（Mickey Djuric/Canadian Press）
item.description:
Mickey Djuric / Canadian Press:
Meta tests blocking news on Instagram and Facebook in Canada, planning for a potential full block of news outlets if Canada passes Bill C-18, following Google  —  OTTAWA - Meta is preparing to block news for some Canadians on Facebook and Instagram in a temporary test that is expected to last the majority of the month.

item.title: WGAが「不適切な」報酬の拒否を促したため、Netflixの株主は2023年の最高幹部の報酬を承認する非拘束議案を支持しない（Dade Hayes/Deadline)
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
Netflix shareholders decline to support a nonbinding proposal approving 2023 compensation for top execs after the WGA urged rejection of “inappropriate” pay  —  Netflix shareholders declined to support a proposal affirming the pay packages for top executives during a vote …

item.title: Verizon、Netflix PremiumとParamount+にShowtimeを組み合わせたストリーミングバンドルを月額25.99ドルで導入、定額制アグリゲーションハブ「+play」を経由（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Verizon introduces a streaming bundle combining Netflix Premium and Paramount+ with Showtime for $25.99/month, via its +play subscription aggregation hub  —  For the first time, rival streaming services Netflix and Paramount+ are coming together in a price-discounted bundle, exclusively for Verizon wireless customers in the U.S.

item.title: The BlockがリアルタイムのNews APIを公開、開発者、投資家、データプロバイダーが暗号とデジタル資産に関するセクター別の報道にアクセスできるようにする（The Block）。
item.description:
The Block:
The Block unveils a real-time News API that gives developers, investors, and data providers access to its sector-specific coverage of crypto and digital assets  —  Today, The Block unveiled its real-time news API, giving application developers, investors, and data providers …

item.title: カリフォルニア州議会が46対6で可決、テック企業に広告収入の一定割合をアウトレットに支払うことを義務付ける法案を可決、法案は州上院に進む（Andrew Sheeler/Sacramento Bee）
item.description:
Andrew Sheeler / Sacramento Bee:
The California Assembly votes 46-6 to pass a bill requiring tech companies to pay a percentage of ad revenue to outlets; the bill advances to the State Senate  —  One day after Facebook parent company Meta threatened to remove news content from its platforms if Assembly Bill 886 becomes law …

item.title: [スレッド】解雇が迫る中、インサイダーユニオンがEOD（@insiderunion）によりインサイダーの経営陣と契約合意に至らない場合、6月1日23時59分（日本時間）にストライキを予定しています。
item.description:
@insiderunion:
[Thread] As layoffs loom, the Insider Union plans to strike on June 1 at 11:59pm ET if the union can't reach a contract deal with Insider's management by EOD  —  Our members have spoken. We're going ON STRIKE if management doesn't remedy its unfair labor practices and settle a fair contract by THURSDAY AT 11:59 P.M. ET. 🔥🪧🔥 [image]

item.title: ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙、ジオターゲットの無料天気予報ニュースレターを配信開始。
item.description:
Sophie Culpepper / Nieman Lab:
The New York Times launches a free, geotargeted weather newsletter that lets readers pick up to four places in the continental US for which to get risk alerts  —  Readers can opt in to receive morning emails explaining the level and type of extreme weather risk in up to four different places.

item.title: ガネット24紙の米国従業員数百人が、予算削減に抗議するため、ガネットの年次株主総会当日の6月5日に職場から立ち去る予定だ（Elahe Izadi/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Elahe Izadi / Washington Post:
Hundreds of US employees at 24 Gannett newspapers plan to walk off the job on June 5, the day of Gannett's annual shareholder meeting, to protest budget cuts  —  Hundreds of staffers at Gannett newspapers across seven states are protesting their company's leadership and job cuts

item.title: WordPress.com、有料購読とプレミアムコンテンツの無料ニュースレター配信を開始、無料プランを含むすべてのWordPress.comブログで利用可能（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
WordPress.com launches paid subscriptions and premium content in free newsletters, available to all WordPress.com blogs, including those on the free plan  —  WordPress.com is taking on Substack and others with today's news that its Newsletter product will now support paid subscriptions and premium content.

item.title: Philadelphia Inquirerがスポーツ観戦や選挙結果報道などのライブイベントでiPhoneのロック画面ウィジェットを「セカンドスクリーン体験」として利用する方法（Sarah Scire/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
How The Philadelphia Inquirer uses iPhone lock screen widgets as a “second-screen experience” during live events like sports games and election results coverage  —  The news org is catering to the readers who spend a lot of time on their phones during live events like sports games and election returns.
